body:
This can take a few minutes to arrive.

If you don't get an email: 
 * check your spam or junk folders
 * check you have entered the correct email
 * [resend the email](email_resent)
heading: Check your email
lede: We've sent you an email. Follow the instructions to finish setting up your form. (Phil, we need to mention the time limit in completing the next step in this process... or making it clear the users data is not saved until they have complete the next step).
